Rocky Mountain University
― of Health Professions ―
Physician Assistant Program

educating reflective professionals who value and practice evidence-based, patient-centered care in the context of a digitally demanding world

Prerequisite Courses Help Tables

We have included below help tables listing courses available at Universities and Colleges throughout Utah that meet prerequisite course requirements for Rocky Mountain University of Health Professions Physician Assistant Program.

Brigham Young University - Provo (BYU-Provo)

PREREQUISITE COURSE, COURSE SERIES, or COURSE COMBO
Human Anatomy PDBIO-2103 –OR– PDBIO-2203
Human Physiology PDBIO-3054 –OR– PDBIO-3623 & PDBIO-3631 combo
General Biology BIO-1304 –OR– PDBIO-1202 & MMBIO-2403 combo
Microbiology MMBIO-2213 & MMBIO-2221 combo –OR– MMBIO-4074
General Chem CHEM-1113 & CHEM-1123 & CHEM-1132 series –OR–
CHEM-1054 & CHEM-1063 & CHEM-1071 series
Statistics STAT-1213, STAT-1513, STAT-2013, –OR– PSYCH-3084
Math MATH-1103, MATH-1113, MATH-1124, –OR– MATH-1194
Psychology PSYCH-1113 –OR– PSYCH-3423
Med Terminology LATIN-1232 –OR– NURS-1022
